title: API Academy: Learn How to Learn About APIs
description: To unlock the storage chest and obtain the spell card, you must learn how to learn about APIs. This is achieved through *documentation*.

validation_fields.name: answer1
validation_fields.label: Visit the documentation for the [Twilio Programmable SMS API](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms). In the left hand menu, look for a heading called *API Reference*. List one of the types of `Resource` objects described under the Programmable SMS API Reference section.
